name: SokoAdventure
description:
SokoAdventure is a puzzle game inspired by Sokoban, the classic game where you have to push all boxes to specific positions to beat a level.

In SokoAdventure, you will have to do more than just push boxes in order to beat the game: cover holes in your path, find keys to unlock doors and avoid deadly enemies! You will also venture through a variety of scenarios during your journey.

The concept is simple, but it gets pretty challenging as you go forward... Can you beat all 50 levels?

This game is completely open source! All the graphics and sounds are also free to use. Check the source code here.
